Properties.ProtectedString:
ball = script.Parent damage = 8
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=13775466" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
function onTouched(hit) if hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end
-- HitSound:Play() ball.Parent = nil end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid) -- todo: make tag expire local tag = ball:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then local new_tag = tag:clone() new_tag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
connection = ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
wait(5) ball.Parent = nil

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true
local reloadCount = 0
function fire(v)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local PewPew = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("PewPew")
if (PewPew == nil) then PewPew = Instance.new("Sound") PewPew.Name = "PewPew" PewPew.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=16433315" PewPew.Parent = Tool.Handle PewPew.Volume = 1 end
local missile = Instance.new("Part")
missile.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(199) missile.Shape = 0 missile.BottomSurface = 0 missile.TopSurface = 0 missile.Name = "lead" missile.Reflectance = .5
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,98,0) force.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local new_script = script.Parent.LaserBlast:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
for i = 1, 8 do local missileClone= missile:clone() local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position local fireDirect = Vector3.new(v.x + math.random(-5,5)/50,v.y + math.random(-5,5)/50,v.z + math.random(-5,5)/50) spawnPos = spawnPos + (fireDirect * 10)
missile.Position = spawnPos missile.Velocity = fireDirect * 200
missileClone.Parent = game.Workspace end
PewPew:Play()
end
function gunUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,.981,-.196) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,.196,.981) end
function gunOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) end
function isTurbo(character) return character:FindFirstChild("BoltHelm") ~= nil end
function onActivated() if not enabled then return end
enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
local reload = .7
gunUp() fire(lookAt) wait(0.1) gunOut() wait(reload)
reloadCount = reloadCount + 1 if reloadCount > 3 then Tool.Handle.Reload:Play() reloader() reloadCount = 0 end
enabled = true
end
function reloader()
Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0,0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0)
wait(0.3) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0,-0.1,0) wait(0.3) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0,0.1,0) wait(0.3)
Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0,-0.5,-0.4) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0)
end
function onEquipped() Tool.Handle.Reload:Stop() Tool.Handle.PewPew:Stop() end
function onUnequipped() Tool.Handle.Reload:Stop() Tool.Handle.PewPew:Stop() end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
wait(.2) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
